title: Jimmy Haslem: Todd Monken was on top of the list of coaching candidates the entire time

sources.name: Pro Football Talk
sources.title: Jimmy Haslem: Todd Monken was on top of the list of coaching candidates the entire time
sources.description: The Browns held a press conference to introduce Todd Monken as their new head coach on Tuesday and team owner Jimmy Haslam spent some time discussing the process that led to Monken landing the job.
